author: Richard Phillips
method: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add the sliced new potatoes and butter and fry the potatoes until golden-brown all over. Sprinkle the potatoes with fresh oregano and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve in a bowl.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  250g/9oz cooked new potatoes, sliced,  25g/1oz butter,  small handful fresh oregano, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
